data.name: Sleep Paralysis: The Uncanny Valley
data.detailed_description:
Premise

16. August 2018 - Barkley Valley, British Columbia, Canada.
Thomas is suffering from sleep paralysis and you are trying to find a cure to this awful experience. As you go down the rabbit hole, you might find that your problems get worse...
Face the fears that had haunted Thomas for a very long time. Experience different environments that seem to be aware of your presence. Encounter uncanny entities, that have very human-like characteristics, but act in a very non-human way.
Will you find a cure and survive or fall into darkness?
In this game, the strongest weapon is your mind.

Key Features

  • Narrated Story
  • Making Meaningful Decisions
  • Managing Fear and Stress
  • Solving Puzzles
  • Investigating Your Problem

Key Features In Detail

Narrated Story - Thomas is writing about the events that happened to him over the past few days. You are playing Thomas during these pivotal days and influence the story that is being told.
Making Meaningful Decisions - Some of your decisions have short, medium and long term consequences.
Managing Fear and Stress - Thomas can only take a certain amount of stress. You have to make sure you are dealing with his fears and stress in the right way.
Solving Puzzles - Some parts of the game require you to solve puzzles in order to progress in the story.
Investigating Your Problem - You have to try and find out what is happening to Thomas. You can do this by paying attention to all the information provided in the game (narration, websites, notes, pictures, video tapes etc...)


WARNING: The game may potentially trigger seizures for people with photosensitive epilepsy. Player discretion is advised.

data.short_description: A story driven first person psychological horror thriller. You are suffering from sleep paralysis and you will try to find a cure to this awful experience. But the more you try, the worse it seems to get... and soon you awake to your worst fears, quite literally. A decision driven horror experience.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel(R) Core(TM) i7-8700 CPU
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Sound Card: NVIDIA High definition

Recommended:
